Key Match Events: Buddy Hield exploded for 27 points and seven 3s off the bench
The Warriors won convincingly by 41 points, 127-86
Pre-Game Insights: The Warriors entered the game following a commanding 140-104 win over the Portland Trail Blazers
The Jazz were still seeking their first win after a narrow loss to the Memphis Grizzlies
Steph Curry remained optimistic about the Warriors’ outlook despite missing out on major offseason targets
Post-Match Reflections: Steph Curry confident in Warriors’ potential despite missing out on major offseason targets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Warriors set a franchise record for the largest margin of victory in a road opener and most points in any season debut with the 36-point triumph
Lauri Markkanen struggled, shooting 4-for-17 for 13 points
